channel.title: Shortcuts on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Shortcuts on Jeroen Mols

item.title: Pro Android Studio - Taming the interface
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Not only can anything in Android Studio be controlled with a keyboard shortcut, it offers many more simple tricks to make you more productive. To conclude this series, we will look at how you can control the interface, invoke every (!

item.title: Pro Android Studio - Refactoring
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Refactoring can be tedious and easily introduce bugs. The main reason for this is the number of manual steps involved: rename, move, copy-paste,… So wouldn’t it make sense to automate this and have Android Studio do all the work for you?

item.title: Pro Android Studio - Code navigation
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Struggling to navigate your code? Getting lost in deep inheritance hierarchies? Hard time figuring out relations between classes? Let’s learn how to navigate code in Android Studio like a pro.
